Name: A Promised Moment
AttributesDescription: The 2026 birthday song, specially readapted by your dear friends.
BgDescription:
A piece of music as gentle and bright as the afternoon breeze that once brushed your cheek.
It carries shared memories of adventures, unspoken gratitude, and quiet longing.
With every note, the happy days you lived through return once more. This isn’t merely a song written for you—it’s a moment in time, carefully kept for you.
Happy birthday, Rover.
ObtainedShowDescription: The 2025 birthday song, magnificently performed by the Plushie Squad.
